measure.name: create_deer_prototype_building
measure.display_name: Create DEER Prototype Building ALPHA Version
measure.description: Creates the DEER Prototype Building Models as starting points for other analyses. This measure is a work-in-progress ALPHA version. Some of the building types do not simulate correctly, and no attempt has yet been made to ensure that the simulation results match the DOE-2 DEER Prototypes.

argument.name: building_hvac
argument.default_value: Assembly: Split or Packaged DX Unit with Gas Furnace
